title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Nov 2 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Nov 2 2021
description:
Florida Governor Ron DeSantis joins Clay and Buck to talk insane covid mandates. Why is the media silent on Florida's low covid numbers? The Sunshine State welcomes all first responders fleeing covid tyranny. Parents know what's best for their kids. Without Ron DeSantis the country looks much different. Sen. Joe Manchin won't vote for the trillion dollar Biden Budget Boondoggle. Youngkin makes his final push as McAuliffe calls everyone racists.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
